name: Chess But You Play As A Tank
name_original: Chess But You Play As A Tank
description:
A game where you play as a tank fighting chess pieces. Made for Miz Jam 1 in 48 non consecutive hours. 36 levels total.

Controls with keyboard and mouse

Sound created using https://beepbox.co/
